price: Twaciye Tumugumiriza akabanga Turanamubabarira ivyaha vyiwe. Mu vy’ukuri Dawudi, ni ukuri ari mu batonye kuri Twebwe Allah, ari no mu bagenewe uburuhukiro bwiza mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
arabic: فَغَفَرۡنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

meta.transliteration: faghafarnā lahu dhālika wa-inna lahu ʿindanā lazul'fā waḥus'na maābin
